column5: title says it all, more cold weather, less snow, great ice, faster out fishing =)
oh wait, coming thursday and friday is going to be like -15.. i hope i'll be out on friday. =)
Hope for more nights of the same or colder. -20 for 4 nights ought to get 'er done. -5 to -10 overnight should maintain it nicely. Guess I like to dream.
Yup.."  it will be making ice tonight... and all though the cold snap.. It will be good to go fishin by next weekend for sure...
